Summary: International brand and the way they work
Full Content:
How do you feel if someone remembers you from your review? This afternoon I stop by e mart Starbucks (4 times a week), when I was looking for food then cashier asked me, do I write a review and asked me if my name is Emrah :) I was shocked and felt happiness. I really proud of her since how many of cashier/waitress/waiter/owner check their store review on foody or internet ? It shows how much she loves her work and even you work there but you make yourself itâ€™s like your business not work for money. I think because itâ€™s different between international brand and local brand and the way they are training. Most of Vietnamese (90-95%) are smiling face but how many of them (cashier/waiter/waitress...) try to talk to you and try to know you... the way they approached you very professionally and friendly not like curios who you are. 

Today I ordered double cheese bagel, chocolate loaf and french butter croissant. Yesterday I ordered 3 french butter croissant but not enough for me :) Luckily when I was ordering bagel then she asked me if I wanted extra cheese, 15k vnd more (most of them not tell you how much do you have to pay extra). 

I Tried â€œToffee nut latteâ€ and it s new drink. They put nut and cream on the top. Taste is not strong but very sweet and light. 

When I was sitting upstairs then one of staff came give everyone small cup of new drinks. 
Just suggestion, they may serve hot/cold then clients may take hot/cold drink. 
How many of local coffee shops chain/brand gives a free small cup to try (never seen in Highland, Trung Nguyen or coffee house) Because almost every month they have a new drink beside fix menu. How can you know if they have a new drink or not. Mostly cashier tells us if they have new drink(s) and show from menu with picture. If you donâ€™t know what to drink, you can ask cashier and they give you suggestion (coffee or tea or hot or cold). About drinks Most of them they have hot/cold. 

Free upgrade for citibank card holder (end of this month, I donâ€™t know if they will have in next year or not) 

Overall: 9.6/10
Recommendation: Yes

Summary: Thatâ€™s why the best coffee around the world
Full Content:
No wonder why Starbucks is the best coffee chain around world. in birthday month, (membership or gold card) anytime you can have free cake :) no matter which store you want to have your bd cake. 

Lunch time I always have my coffee E-Mart Starbucks. Staffs are very friendly, smiling face even they remember your name :) which made me very surprised. The best thing about Starbucks is very month they have new drinks (after a while they donâ€™t have). Price s more expensive than other coffee shops but not same place quality. They have colorful cups for Christmas. The best thing is table to table is quite far and you do sit however you want. If you have membership card (you ask staff and easy to have it) each 25 drinks then you have tall size drink free. 

Only bad thing is, I have been waiting for 2-3 weeks eat baked cheese cake. Normally they have baked cheese cake but for 2-3 weeks they did not have until today :) 

They have free upgrades for citibank but only drinks. They have line discount as well.

Summary: Highlands Coffee - The Manor Nguyá»…n Há»¯u Cáº£nh
Full Content:
HIghlands Coffee is one of the household coffee house brands that has successfully established itself in Vietnam. 

Started in 1998 with their flagship outlet in Hanoi, Highlands Coffee has now more than 40 outlets across Vietnam and counting. Although there more than 20 outlets in Saigon, but we particularly enjoy this outlet at The Manor. 

Most outlets would be located in places with lots of human traffic and are usually crowed and noisy. However, at this outlet you can enjoy nice quiet moments while sipping your Vietnamese coffee.

But why we are recommending Highlands Coffee is for their set lunches that are at 49,000vnd. Extremely worth every penny especially eating in a cosy, cool and clean place. And the lunch is really not bad at all. 

We like not just the taste of the food but the creative touch with each dish in terms of preparation and presentation. Impressive for a coffee house! So do drop by Highlands at the Manor or any nearby for your next lunch. You won't regret it!

Food type and taste: Vietnamese cuisine- 3.5/5 stars 
Price: Economic to mid-range
Ambience: Air-conditioned. Cosy for small groups
